curam.util.resources

Class Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandlerDefault

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.resources.Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandlerDefault
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandler, java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    Enclosing class:
    Trace

    public static final class Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandlerDefault
extends java.lang.Object
implements Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandler
    CuramMethodInvocationHandlerDefault is the default method trace handler for Curam. The default method trace handler is the class responsible for wrapping all method invocations with general trace information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object proxy, java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Object[] arguments)
      Invoke the wrapped Business Object while writing the default trace information associated with the invocation.
      void setBizObject(java.lang.Object bizObject)
      Store a reference to the business object that is handled by this handler.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • setBizObject

        public void setBizObject(java.lang.Object bizObject)
        Store a reference to the business object that is handled by this handler.
        Specified by:
        setBizObject in interface Trace.CuramMethodInvocationHandler
        Parameters:
        bizObject - The business object which is handled by this handler.

      • invoke

        public java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.Object proxy,
                               java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                               java.lang.Object[] arguments)
                        throws java.lang.Throwable
        Invoke the wrapped Business Object while writing the default trace information associated with the invocation. This trace information consists of:
        • Business Object Name
        • Method Name
        • Supplied Arguments
        • Result (or stack trace if an exception is thrown).
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
        Parameters:
        proxy - The proxy instance that the method was invoked on. This is not used by this method.
        method - The Method instance corresponding to the interface method invoked on the proxy instance
        arguments - The arguments passed on the method invocation.
        Returns:
        The result of the method invocation on the wrapped business object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - An exception occurred in the method called on the wrapped business object.
